alert.note: Alert for Manua; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 01 at 12:01PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A Wind Advisory is in effect... * Thunderstorms in the area combined with winds from a building ridge northeast will produce windy conditions for the territory through at least Wednesday... * TIMING...through Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking dangerous. Downed shallow-root trees and phone lines are possible. Shifting of loose and unsecured objects are also possible. FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 1155 TAEAO ASO LUA FEPUARI 1 2022 ...UA IAI NEI LE FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI... *O faititili o loo lata mai i le atusamoa, ma se vaega o peau mamafa o le ea o loo i matu i sasa`e, o le a faatupulaia ai savili malolosi i luga o le atunu`u e oo atu i le Aso Lulu. * TAIMI...E oo atu i le Aso Lulu. * NOFOAGA AAFIA...E pau`u laau, lelea ai mea-totino e le`i faamaumauina. Savili malolosi e mafai ona faafaigata ai ona faafoe ai taavale, ae maise lava taavale maualuluga. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O fautuaga mo savili malolosi o lona uiga o savili e oo atu i le 35 mph ma e agi faata`uta`u o le a aafia ai le atunuu. O nei savili malolosi o le a faafaigata ai ona faafoe taavale i luga o le auala tele, ae maise lava taavale tetele ma le maualuluga. Faamolemole ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: A wind advisory means that winds of 35 MPH are expected. Winds This strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
